title.rendered: Smile Foundation organizes Trainers’ Refresher Programme for Change the Game India trainers at Zorba the Buddha.

content.rendered:
Committed to creating change at the grassroots by empowering individuals and nascent organizations, Smile Foundation organized a two-day trainer refresher program for its Change the Game India pool of trainers.

Built on Smile Foundation’s 20 years of extensive experience working with the grassroots in India, Change the Game Academy brings Change the Game India program to strengthen the capabilities of social change makers and grassroots organizations working for better governance and self-sustainability. The program enables trainee organizations to gain credibility and support. It also helps them become self-sufficient by honing their skills in identifying, accessing, and mobilizing locally available resources.

The two-day trainer refresher program included sessions on expectations and challenges at the grassroots, digital fundraising, developments in the social sector at the global and national levels and problem-solving methods to address issues at the grassroots.
